name: Atimi Software
description:
Atimi is a mobile app developer who works with top tier consumer brands that want to extend their reach. Our clients hire us to do their flagship work which delivers on their brand trust and product innovation. We develop apps for iOS, Android, BlackBerry, and Windows Phone. 
We have created apps for a variety of verticals such as: 
- Medical/healthcare 
- Retail 
- Education 
- Entertainment 
- Publishing 
- Financial 
- Sports 
- Fitness 
- Food services
